title: bug
body: custom game is bugged  only 6 people can join then you cant inv anyone

replies.body: Oh snap, yea that sounds pretty dang buggy to me. If at all possible, shoot me a quick screenshot showing that error so I can gather some data about this and see if we can get ahead of it in case it's a widespread bug. Also, please be sure to submit a bug report in the client as well!
but i submitted a bug report in client as you said
No worries about not getting an error message, any info will help! Thanks for the bug report ^_^

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=jgXRH8p2,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2018-01-26T04:14:59.150+0000)
>
> No worries about not getting an error message, any info will help! Thanks for the bug report ^_^

you cant even spectate games in custom and no update has been done about it
its not like an error message once the lobby gets to a certain amount of people you cant invite anyone and the lobby isn't even full
